author: cnbc.com
title: Spotify Technology S.A. to Announce Financial Results for First Quarter 2018
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Spotify Technology S.A. (NYSE:SPOT) will post its first quarter 2018 financial results and letter to shareholders on Wednesday, May 2, 2018 after market close.
The company will hold a question and answer session to discuss first quarter 2018 financial results at 5:00pm Eastern Time. A live webcast will be accessible at investors.spotify.com . A recording of the webcast will also be available following the session.
Questions from investors may be submitted in advance to ir@spotify.com .
About Spotify Technology S.A.
Spotify is the largest global music streaming subscription service with 157 million Monthly Active Users and 71 million Premium Subscribers. With a presence in 65 countries and territories, and more than 35 million tracks, it has transformed the way people access and enjoy music.
Source: Spotify Technology S.A.
